Title: Know Your Rights When Confronted by ICE
DescriptioResource Description:
A flyer that outlines 5 key reminders about your constitutional rights when confronted by (ICE). 
Everyone – regardless of immigration status – has rights in this country. Period.

Title: A Guide to Changing Your Immigration Court Hearing From In-person to Online
DescriptioResource Description: Do you want to change the format of your immigration court hearing from inperson to internet-based (virtual/online)? You can do this by filing a Motion to Change Hearing Format in your immigration case. This guide walks you through the steps to file a Motion to Change Format.
